title: Beautiful Beacon Street 2 Bed, C/D Trains, Longwood Med, CAT OK-9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302356639', 'Rent: $3,200 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Broker Fee: One Month', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking is available for rent', 'Spacious and very bright two bedroom on the fourth floor of a beautiful Beacon Street brownstone(with an elevator), available 9/1!', 'This beautiful unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, tons of windows, a renovated eat-in kitchen, two very good size bedrooms and plenty of charm and character!', 'This building has on-site management, laundry facilities, CATS ARE ALLOWED and PARKING IS AVAILABLE FOR RENT.', 'This unbelievable location is steps away from the C+D trains, The Longwood Medical Area, and just a short distance to Downtown Boston.', 'For further information and showings, call Heidi at 617-699-4568!', 'FEATURES', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Refrigerator', 'Separate Kitchen', 'Heidi Shenker', 'Heidi Shenker Real Estate', '617-699-4568', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Heidi Shenker Real Estate disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Heidi Shenker Real Estate is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
